value.name: Advocates say Rockford-area agencies should release unedited videos of police shootings

value.name: Patterson, Eddie
value.description: Eddie Patterson, 73, died on September 10, surrounded by his children. Eddie was a member of St. Luke United Methodist Church where he led the church’s well-known and successful softball team in ...

value.name: Tiernan Lynch desperate to land Irish Cup glory for Kenny Bruce, Jeff Hughes and people of Larne
value.description: Lynch twice enjoyed Irish Cup success with the Glens as part of Eddie Patterson’s backroom team, but this time he’s the Larne manager, proud to be part of a special group of dreamers.
